roleset.name: To form a concept

example.name: All args
example.text: We can more easily conceptualize speed in miles per hour.

roleset.note: From Clinical Notes corpus; adjectival 'conceptual' based on BOLT-7. Framed by Anwen April 2011

example.name: adjectival rel: conceptual
example.text: The Kuomintang Party only struggles objectively , has no thought system and ideological content ; the goal of its struggle is just conceptual and its members can have all kinds of thoughts .
